attributes.action: Stop the barbaric shooting of wild British birds.
attributes.additional_details:
Protecting the interests of the elite.
They do not need to kill for food
This is merely an outdated barbaric game 
Clay shooting should be adequate …
attributes.background: We oppose against the new guidance that allows the shooting of crows, jackdaws and magpies, so that game shooters can have their barbaric sport.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
